text: Mbe ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrve ga mbuim, ŋgui vhɨrve gari guma Herot mbaram mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani gum Zudain tɨvi kaŋgi gumgir kamgi. Ana mben kamgim, mbe ana han zim, ana mbe fugap kha nzambaren mbe muuŋgi, “Mba Fhe Bakɨme taagip kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap sarigi guma, ana niamuuŋ maaŋgi ŋgun ana tegi.”
